mapper.select: SELECT ps.status_id, ps.product_id, ps.product_status, ps.updated_at, p.product_name, CASE WHEN ps.status_id LIKE '%Ind%' THEN 1 ELSE p.stock END AS stock FROM product_status ps JOIN product p ON ps.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.facility_id = #{facilityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_status (status_id, product_id, product_status, updated_at) VALUES (#{status_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(status_id, LENGTH(#{baseId}) + 1) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) FROM product_status WHERE status_id LIKE CONCAT(#{baseId}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM product_status WHERE status_id = #{status_id}
SELECT ps.status_id, ps.product_status, p.product_id, p.stock, p.management_type FROM product_status ps JOIN product p ON ps.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ps.status_id = #{status_id};

SELECT ps.product_status, CASE WHEN ps.product_status = '대여 가능' THEN p.stock ELSE 0 END AS count FROM product_status ps JOIN product p ON ps.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ps.product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY ps.product_status, p.stock;
